E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Progress of Chris Carpenter
Dear Sir,
Chris Carpenter is doing pretty good at A Denver Zephyrs!
He has an ERA of 2.38, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1993
Subject: Status of Ricky Otero
Dear Sir,
Ricky Otero has an AVG of .247 at AA Gwinnett Braves!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director
